dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1970
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Admires and is grateful for the help two workers gave them: Mike Sollitto, now in the hospital, for his food errands; and Jean Goldstone, recently died, for his engineering help in preparing their First Street house.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 502 1970-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
